Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2016 10:28PM Khanniganslp9 wrote: The only things that helped with my stomach pain and general malaise from taxol was 1) staying ahead of the constipation with collace stool softeners and 2) GREATLY increasing my water intake. After the first three cycles I figured this out and did better when i took two collace in the morning and two in the evening, plus drinking SO much water. My daily goal was 100 ounces, though I always hit a minimum of 70 or 75 ounces. I dreaded drinking all that water and it never tasted good, but it helped my numbers stay in a good range and it helped me feel much better than the first three cycles when I wasn't taking so much collace and water. Best of luck.
